issue.title: Documentation generation script creates "apidocs" directory under site/java
issue.body:
***Note**: This issue was originally created as [ARROW-1686](https://issues.apache.org/jira/browse/ARROW-1686). Please see the [migration documentation](https://gist.github.com/toddfarmer/12aa88361532d21902818a6044fda4c3) for further details.*

### Original Issue Description:
I encountered this when running the doc build. The contents of apidocs should be rsync'd with the java directory in git

comments.body:
***Note**: [Comment](https://issues.apache.org/jira/browse/ARROW-1686?focusedCommentId=16213606) by Wes McKinney (wesm):*
Issue resolved by pull request 1221
